headline: How the U.S. Fiscal Year-End on September 30 Will Shape Stock & Futures Markets
summary: U.S. Fiscal year-end Sept 30 is a game-changer! Defense & tech stocks rise, or SPY falters due to shutdown fears. Be prepared for Oct 01.

headline: Drone Detection Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Lockheed Martin, RTX, and Northrop Grumman Lead with Advanced Defense Technologies and Strategic Contracts
summary: The Drone Detection Companies Quadrant offers an in-depth industry analysis, highlighting key players and trends shaping the global drone detection market. With over 100 companies evaluated, the top 15 were recognized as quadrant leaders, including industry giants like Lockheed Martin, RTX, and Northrop Grumman. The market's growth is fueled by the rising use of drones across sectors and increased demand for airspace security amid geopolitical tensions. Technological advancements, such as AI-pow

headline: Is Now the Right Time to Reassess Lockheed Martin After Its Recent 18% Stock Drop?
summary: If you’re standing on the edge about what to do with Lockheed Martin stock, you’re certainly not alone. This defense giant’s shares have delivered a classic roller coaster over the last few years. In the short term, the stock has dipped, down nearly 18% over the past year. But if you look at a longer timeline, a different picture emerges: Lockheed Martin is still up more than 12% over three years and just over 30% for those who have held on for five. These swings have investors asking whether...

headline: Lockheed Martin Stock Outlook: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
summary: Lockheed Martin has significantly underperformed the broader market over the past year, yet analysts remain moderately bullish on the stock’s prospects.
